Ventilation

Commercial Refrigeration Experts

Display equipment ranging from stainless steel self service sandwich units to chilled and frozen food displays. All equipment supplied comes complete with full 12 months manufacturers parts and labour warranty.

Refrigerated Display Equipment

The equipment we often install for our custoemrs ranges from stainless steel self service sandwich units all the way to to chilled and frozen food displays. We also understand that peace of mind is essential, and so all the equipment we supply comes complete with a full 12 months manufacturers parts and labour warranty.
